text.textblock: Endangered and threatened species, Exports, Imports, Reporting and
Accordingly, part 17, subchapter B of chapter I, title 50 of the
Code of Federal Regulations is amended as set forth below:
1. The authority citation for part 17 continues to read as
4201-4245; Public Law 99-625, 100 Stat. 3500; unless otherwise noted.
2. Amend §17.12(h) by adding the following, in alphabetical order
Buckwheat family,'' to the List of Endangered and Threatened Plants:
